h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 6
content: You can also get another Blood of the Iron Bull in the area by defeating the Earth Wolf boss in the courtyard opposite the chest for the previous material. It is to the left of where you fought the two mini-bosses on the ascent up the hill. This Yellow Wind Ridge boss will drop his Spirit too.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 6'.
The content is as follows:
You can also get another Blood of the Iron Bull in the area by defeating the Earth Wolf boss in the courtyard opposite the chest for the previous material. It is to the left of where you fought the two mini-bosses on the ascent up the hill. This Yellow Wind Ridge boss will drop his Spirit too.
